Table of Contents

  1. HTML Structure
  2. CSS Files and Structure
  3. JavaScript
  4. Sources and Credits

A) HTML Structure - top

This theme is based on responsive Twitter Bootstrap 3 grid and components.
Source code is well commented so navigation should be easy.

Content is divided into sections.

B) CSS Files and Structure - top

There are following css files in this theme:

  1. bootstrap.css - Twitter Bootstrap standard css file
  2. custom.css - main theme styling, white theme
  3. dark.css - dark theme styling

Custom.css file contains all of the specific stylings for the page. The file is separated into easy to find sections.

If you would like to edit a specific section of the site, simply find the appropriate label in the CSS file, and then scroll down until you find the appropriate style that needs to be edited.

C) JavaScript - top

This theme imports following Javascript files:

  1. jquery.min.js - Latest jQuery
  2. bootstrap.min.js
  3. modernizr.js
  4. bootstrap-progressbar.js - Progress bar animations
  5. jquery.easypiechart.js - Charts animations
  6. chart.js - Charts animations trigger
  7. spy.js - Navigation spy scroll
  8. scripts.js - all custom scripts used on site

On the bottom of the index.html page, you can find additional scripts which makes site run properly.

E) Sources and Credits - top

I've used the following images, icons or other files as listed.

  • Twitter Bootstrap - https://github.com/twitter/bootstrap
  • BootstrapProgressBar - https://www.minddust.com/bootstrap-progressbar
  • EasyPieChart - http://robert-fleischmann.de

Setting email recepient from contact form

Open file contact.php and edit line 2 by putting your email address.
